comments:
Description:
Two NullPointExceptions are thrown when open the attached design file and 
insert a group to the second table.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached file
2. In the second table, select the second group header row, right click and 
select Insert Group->Above.

Expected result:
A new group dialog appears.

Actual result:
1.
